English: Try to manipulate the general climate systems on terminal [ITEM_SERIAL]. Use the following backdoor command: [SPECIAL_COMMAND]

French.Translation: Tentez de manipuler les systèmes climatiques sur le terminal [ITEM_SERIAL]. Utilisez la commande de porte dérobée suivante : [SPECIAL_COMMAND].

Italian.Translation: Provare a manipolare i sistemi climatici generali sul terminale [ITEM_SERIAL]. Utilizzare il seguente comando backdoor: [SPECIAL_COMMAND]

German.Translation: Versuchen Sie, die globalen Klimasysteme auf Terminal [ITEM_SERIAL] zu manipulieren. Benutzen Sie den folgenden Hintertür-Befehl: [SPECIAL_COMMAND]

Spanish.Translation: Intenta manipular los sistemas climáticos en la terminal [ITEM_SERIAL]. Utiliza el siguiente comando de puerta trasera: [SPECIAL_COMMAND].

Russian.Translation: Попробуйте настроить климатическую систему с помощью терминала [ITEM_SERIAL]. Используйте секретную команду [SPECIAL_COMMAND].

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Tente manipular os sistemas climáticos gerais no terminal [ITEM_SERIAL]. Use o seguinte comando de backdoor: [SPECIAL_COMMAND]

Polish.Translation: Wpłyń na ogólne układy klimatyczne w terminalu [ITEM_SERIAL]. Użyj polecenia tylnego wejścia: [SPECIAL_COMMAND]

Japanese.Translation: 端末[ITEM_SERIAL]で一般気候システムの操作を試みろ。次のバックドアコマンドを使え：[SPECIAL_COMMAND]

Korean.Translation: 터미널 [ITEM_SERIAL]의 일반 기후 시스템 조작을 시도할 것. 다음 백도어 명령 사용: [SPECIAL_COMMAND]

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 嘗試操控終端[ITEM_SERIAL]的一般氣候系統。使用以下後門指令：[SPECIAL_COMMAND]

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 尝试在终端[ITEM_SERIAL]上操控总体气候系统。使用以下后门命令：[SPECIAL_COMMAND]

name: WardenObjectiveData.SpecialTerminalCommand_R4B2_L2.MainObjective_MainObjective
